synopsis.text:
On the canvas of ancient China, a tale of power, courage, and deception unfolds. The once prosperous kingdom of Yin is now under the malevolent reign of Dakki, a captivating fox spirit, who manipulates Emperor Chu-o and wreaks havoc across the nation. To combat this evil, the immortal sages initiate the Houshin Project, a mission entrusted to Taikobo, an immortal-in-training.

As the chosen one, Taikobo embarks on a perilous journey to hunt down and seal away the malevolent demons plaguing the world. Along the way, he gathers a formidable team of allies, each with their unique abilities. However, Taikobo's mission is not without its challenges. Bunchuu, the most powerful royal hermit of Yin, stands resolute against Taikobo to safeguard the old kingdom.

Caught between his duty to the Houshin Project and the loyalty to his clan, which was once destroyed by a beautiful demon, Taikobo faces a daunting question: Who can he truly trust in this battle among invincible hermits? As the death match commences, the future of Yin hangs in the balance, waiting to be tipped in favor of either chaos or tranquility. (Source: Original Synopsis)
